scripts.clean:temp: vrs clean data work target log -force
scripts.reset:all: vrs clean data work target log upload -force && npm run build && npm run import
scripts.reset: npm run clean:temp && npm run build && npm run import
scripts.build:full.clean: npm run clean:temp && npm run build && npm run build:native
scripts.zip:release: vrs backup target/visionr-demo-$NPM_PACKAGE_VERSION$-release-$OS_NATIVE_IDENT$.zip full native db -dbformat json
scripts.build:release: npm run build:full.clean && npm run build:generated && npm run zip:source && npm run zip:update && npm run zip:release && npm run zip:release.native && npm run generate:demo.installer
